attributes.review: Took forever to download and left my phone messed up for a week with viruses the only thing that fixed my phone was going on my handy dandy TikTok and it fixed my phone like the angel it is. I can’t believe this does this to phones I don’t recommend at all please don’t risk it.
attributes.title: Why is this allowed?🤢🤢

attributes.review: I got this app to try to support my country but immediately a virus from china entered my phone and hacked all of my passwords and information. i had to call my credit card company to freeze my account and i had to create a new email. BE CAREFUL this app reads all of your information
attributes.title: now need a new phone

attributes.review: When I first downloaded the app my phone started glitching. It took over an hour to stop ! As soon as I got The the app my doctor called me and said I had get my legs and booty  amputated!! Now I am Bootyless and have to write a horrible review . Also trumps peen looks like a garlic knot dipped in Chetto dust 🧚‍♂️🥰0/10 would never recommend😤😤😤😤
attributes.title: This app is cursed🐀

attributes.review: This app took an entire day to download and actually ended up breaking my phone. It cause it to overheat and i had to get a brand new one💔💔. I just wanted to support my favorite circus act, but instead my phone and all of my information in it was hack😿😿. Then, when i finally opened the app all i saw was porn ads🤢🤢.
attributes.title: THIS APP IS DANGEROUS

attributes.review: After trying to use this app many times it kept on crashing my iPad. There was this weird person named trump who kept on popping up on the app too. Honestly that didn’t affect me only the crashing and slow movement of the app did.
attributes.title: Absolutely slow and Crashes

attributes.review: just like our current leadership this app is a disgrace 🥰 it was horribly developed and you can tell they put little thought or time into it. I downloaded to see where my presidential cheeto would be and how to see him in person but after attempting to use the app I was disgusted. horrible 0/10
attributes.title: horrendous

attributes.review: Dear trump u are the worst person I know u are the pumpkin that is in the pumpkin patch that nobody likes if u get another 4years Im calling Kung-Flu and u know u got. Coronavirus soo stop saying everyone else has it when u do just wait till Corona is ova I going to Dc and it’s the end for u I’m deleting this app only got it cause I needed to write this goodbye my love does not go to you!!😂😳
attributes.title: TikTok

attributes.review: I would give this app 0 stars if possible. It is organized horribly. The graphics are sub par. The information added is not recent. I wanted to sign up to go to one of the trump rallies but it would not let me click the links. Bunker boy has failed us again...🍊😭
attributes.title: Very bad, wouldn’t recommend

attributes.review: i wanted to download the app to support our lovely president orange 🍊. but after waiting 5 hours for it to properly download i have given up. and when it finally did download the app was glitchy and slow. would not recommend. also im definitely apart of the gen z thing. 😡
attributes.title: Disappointed ✨🤢

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to support our wonderful president. yet the app was terrible as soon as i opened the app i saw a deeply disturbing photo. i am not apart of this tiktok situation but this app was horrible. after i set up my account it had many glitches and was very laggy. do not recommend. #savebarron2020
attributes.title: ✨🧚‍♂️absolutely terrible🧚‍♂️✨
